articles.author: Lenin Ndebele
articles.title: In Africa, you can live in a healthy state up to the age of 56 - WHO report - News24
articles.description: Healthy life expectancy in Africa has increased by an impressive 10 years between the turn of the century and 2019, a new World Health Organisation (WHO) assessment report says.
articles.content:
• The WHO says the lifespan for a healthy life in Africa increased between 2000 and 2019.
  • Despite the marked improvement, Africa still falls below the world average of 64 years.
